item.title: Using Emacs for bookmark management
item.description: This post is inspired by Mike Zamansky’s video channel on youtube1.Since I am now using Arc as my main browser so usually I don’t usually need to manage my bookmark, sometimes when I saw interesting blogs and information, I still want to have it somewhere and preferably an annotation to tell me why I store it at the first place, to have this sort of bookmark in my emacs comes in handy.
